ingredients: 8 skinless chicken thighs, OR 6 to 8 drumsticks
1/3 cup chopped onion (I used purple onion)
1 thumb-size piece fresh galangal OR ginger, grated or finely chopped
1 yellow chili, minced, OR 1 red chili, minced (to taste - can be omitted for very mild curry)
2 kaffir lime leaves OR 3-4 bay leaves
optional: 1 cinnamon stick or pinch of ground cinnamon
